1: %% common_test suite for mylib
    2: 
    3: -module(mylib_SUITE).
    4: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    5: 
    6: -compile(export_all).
    7: 
    8: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
    9: %% Function: suite() -> Info
   10: %%
   11: %% Info = [tuple()]
   12: %%   List of key/value pairs.
   13: %%
   14: %% Description: Returns list of tuples to set default properties
   15: %%              for the suite.
   16: %%
   17: %% Note: The suite/0 function is only meant to be used to return
   18: %% default data values, not perform any other operations.
   19: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   20: suite() -> [{timetrap, {seconds, 20}}].
   21: 
   22: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Function: groups() -> [Group]
   24: %%
   25: %% Group = {GroupName,Properties,GroupsAndTestCases}
   26: %% GroupName = atom()
   27: %%   The name of the group.
   28: %% Properties = [parallel | sequence | Shuffle | {RepeatType,N}]
   29: %%   Group properties that may be combined.
   30: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [Group | {group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   31: %% TestCase = atom()
   32: %%   The name of a test case.
   33: %% Shuffle = shuffle | {shuffle,Seed}
   34: %%   To get cases executed in random order.
   35: %% Seed = {integer(),integer(),integer()}
   36: %% RepeatType = repeat | repeat_until_all_ok | repeat_until_all_fail |
   37: %%              repeat_until_any_ok | repeat_until_any_fail
   38: %%   To get execution of cases repeated.
   39: %% N = integer() | forever
   40: %%
   41: %% Description: Returns a list of test case group definitions.
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: groups() -> [].
   44: 
   45: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   46: %% Function: all() -> GroupsAndTestCases
   47: %%
   48: %% GroupsAndTestCases = [{group,GroupName} | TestCase]
   49: %% GroupName = atom()
   50: %%   Name of a test case group.
   51: %% TestCase = atom()
   52: %%   Name of a test case.
   53: %%
   54: %% Description: Returns the list of groups and test cases that
   55: %%              are to be executed.
   56: %%
   57: %%      NB: By default, we export all 1-arity user defined functions
   58: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   59: all() ->
   60:     [ {exports, Functions} | _ ] = ?MODULE:module_info(),
   61:     [ FName || {FName, _} <- lists:filter(
   62:                                fun ({module_info,_}) -> false;
   63:                                    ({all,_}) -> false;
   64:                                    ({init_per_suite,1}) -> false;
   65:                                    ({end_per_suite,1}) -> false;
   66:                                    ({_,1}) -> true;
   67:                                    ({_,_}) -> false
   68:                                end, Functions)].
   69: 
   70: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   71: %% Function: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   72: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
   73: %%
   74: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   75: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   76: %% Reason = term()
   77: %%   The reason for skipping the suite.
   78: %%
   79: %% Description: Initialization before the suite.
   80: %%
   81: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
   82: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
   83: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   84: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   85:     Config.
   86: 
   87: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   88: %% Function: end_per_suite(Config0) -> void() | {save_config,Config1}
   89: %%
   90: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
   91: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
   92: %%
   93: %% Description: Cleanup after the suite.
   94: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   95: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   96:     ok.
   97: 
   98: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   99: %% Function: init_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
  100: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  101: %%
  102: %% GroupName = atom()
  103: %%   Name of the test case group that is about to run.
  104: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  105: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding configuration data for the group.
  106: %% Reason = term()
  107: %%   The reason for skipping all test cases and subgroups in the group.
  108: %%
  109: %% Description: Initialization before each test case group.
  110: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  111: init_per_group(_group, Config) ->
  112:     Config.
  113: 
  114: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  115: %% Function: end_per_group(GroupName, Config0) ->
  116: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1}
  117: %%
  118: %% GroupName = atom()
  119: %%   Name of the test case group that is finished.
  120: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  121: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding configuration data for the group.
  122: %%
  123: %% Description: Cleanup after each test case group.
  124: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  125: end_per_group(_group, Config) ->
  126:     Config.
  127: 
  128: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  129: %% Function: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  130: %%               Config1 | {skip,Reason} | {skip_and_save,Reason,Config1}
  131: %%
  132: %% TestCase = atom()
  133: %%   Name of the test case that is about to run.
  134: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  135: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  136: %% Reason = term()
  137: %%   The reason for skipping the test case.
  138: %%
  139: %% Description: Initialization before each test case.
  140: %%
  141: %% Note: This function is free to add any key/value pairs to the Config
  142: %% variable, but should NOT alter/remove any existing entries.
  143: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  144: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  145:     Config.
  146: 
  147: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  148: %% Function: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config0) ->
  149: %%               void() | {save_config,Config1} | {fail,Reason}
  150: %%
  151: %% TestCase = atom()
  152: %%   Name of the test case that is finished.
  153: %% Config0 = Config1 = [tuple()]
  154: %%   A list of key/value pairs, holding the test case configuration.
  155: %% Reason = term()
  156: %%   The reason for failing the test case.
  157: %%
  158: %% Description: Cleanup after each test case.
  159: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  160: end_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  161:     Config.
  162: 
  163: test_mylib() ->
  164:     [{userdata,[{doc,"Testing the mylib module"}]}].
  165: 
  166: test_mylib(_Config) ->
  167:     {skip,"Not implemented."}.
